# ElementAlignment.AppendElementNamePadding method

Append padding to a StringBuilder as appropriate for an element name.

```csharp
public void AppendElementNamePadding(XElement element, StringBuilder stringBuilder)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| element | An element whose name has been written already |
| stringBuilder | Where to append the spaces, if required. |
